data.content:
adjective
US or Brit coloured
having color :not black or white
We decorated the Christmas tree with colored lights.
colored glass/pencils
influenced by a person's feelings or prejudices
He gave a highly colored account of the events.
old-fashioned + sometimes offensive
of a race other than white especially; :1black
a colored man/woman/child
colored people/folks
of or relating to people who are not white
The town she grew up in had a colored church and a white church. [=a church attended by black people and a church attended by white people]
